resources.string: Unlock multi freeform limits for MIUI 13 devices
You seem to be using an outdated version of LSPosed or LSPosed is not active, please update LSPosed or activate it and try again.
This will also affect the behavior of the floating windows while entering the Recents page
After ignoring, all notifications received by side-hide apps will show in bubbles
Some notifications through Mi Push may not be supported
Make most notifications can be slide to floating window
Not recommended. The logic of multi-minifreeform is lacked in MIUI, so it\'s easy to meet bugs after enabling this function. Do NOT give feedback on this unless you have a way to fix it.
Turn all floating windows into mini floating windows when entering Recents page
Try to fix conversation bubbles not showing by re-enabling conversation bubbles service
